```{r setup, include=FALSE}
require(ggplot2)
require(tidyverse)
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
library(patchwork)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)


```

```{r}
Not_skipped_tracks <- data.frame(read_csv("data/tf_0_reduced.csv"))
Skipped_tracks <- data.frame(read_csv("data/tf_1_reduced.csv"))
All_tracks <- data.frame(read_csv("data/tf_reduced.csv"))
```
```{r}
ggplot(data = All_tracks, aes(x = us_popularity_estimate)) +
  geom_histogram()
ggplot(data = All_tracks, aes(x = tempo)) +
  geom_histogram()
ggplot(data = All_tracks, aes(x = energy)) +
  geom_histogram()
ggplot(data = All_tracks, aes(x = valence)) +
  geom_histogram()
ggplot(data = All_tracks, aes(x = danceability)) +
  geom_histogram()
ggplot(data = All_tracks, aes(x = acousticness)) +
  geom_histogram()
ggplot(data = All_tracks, aes(x = loudness)) +
  geom_histogram()
ggplot(data = All_tracks, aes(x = bounciness)) +
  geom_histogram()
ggplot(data = All_tracks, aes(x = beat_strength)) +
  geom_histogram()
ggplot(data = All_tracks, aes(x = duration)) +
  geom_histogram()
ggplot(data = All_tracks, aes(x = instrumental)) +
  geom_histogram()
ggplot(data = All_tracks, aes(x = liveness)) +
  geom_histogram()
```
